markdownRemark.html: Let's say we have an application where, in general, it makes sense to use a relational database. As an example, let's pretend we're running a coffee shop and our system takes care of managing inventory. We put this inventory data to a lot of different uses, from customer-facing use cases like building our menues to business-related use cases like budgeting and deciding what we should buy or not buy.
